website_summaries.verdict: Omega's professional shaving brush transforms soap into a denser, rich foam.
pros: High-quality, natural boar hairbristles are longer than normal
Enables you to cover wider area
cons: Requires a break-in period to prime the boar bristles

customer_reviews.title: Best brush for the money
customer_reviews.text: The handle is longer than most, as is the knot. Since it is a Boar's hair brush, the bristles are plenty stiff enough to walk thru the hardest soaps, yet lather well on the face with no harshness. I own several primo badger hair brushes, a few synthetics, and one boar's hair brush I purchased years and years ago at a drug store. All in all, I'm now thinking that this $11 brush will be my new favorite. I'll be on the lookout for more Omega's, I'm sure. Good stuff.
customer_reviews.author: mjrodney

customer_reviews.title: Quality Brush
customer_reviews.text: I've been using a brush for shaving for about 5 years now and have used several brushes. This one has a large handle and a plentiful knot. There is some animal smell when new. I slightly prefer this to my Van Der Haggen badger brush because the bristles are slightly stiffer. Update: this now feels softer than the badger brushes and has more structure. I'll stick with this brush.
customer_reviews.author: Keith K.

customer_reviews.title: Great brush for a newbie
customer_reviews.text: I'm gonna rate this 5 stars for now. It's my first venture into the DE world of shaving. I used Gillette cartridge razors as a boy growing up and switched to electric around 20 years old. Now I'm moving onto DE wet shaving. Picked up all my supplies from Amazon and this is the brush I settled on. So far I am happy with it. It's firm but it doesn't overdue it. I was able to get a real nice lather with it so for a first timers brush I love this. I have nothing to compare it to at this time so I'll say it's 5 star worthy.
customer_reviews.author: KevinB

customer_reviews.title: Great experience to make things right.
customer_reviews.text: Seller made it right! There was a flaw with the bristles and I contacted Amazon the day after the product arrived. Great customer service where they refunded my money right away and very easily. I reordered the product and the replacement was flawless. Works great and as expected. Long and stiff bristles. The musty smell went away after about 10 shaves and the bristles are breaking in. Maybe 1 or 2 hairs came loose at first. Apply's shaving cream and soap very well and holds a lot of water.
customer_reviews.author: NHTSAMMY

customer_reviews.title: Best shave brush
customer_reviews.text: This is the best shave brush I've had in past 30 years. Very high quality long boar bristle, none have fallen out. Not too soft, just right. Plastic handle, that is better than wood.
customer_reviews.author: bonair

customer_reviews.title: Love this brush!
customer_reviews.text: This brush is massive and i love it! I have all kinds of grades of badger and horse brushes and I swear by the boar brush. The brush has a very nice backbone to make lathering easy. It also exfoliate the skin fantastically. Before actual use, I had to get rid of the smell and break in the brush. The more you use the brush the softer it gets, and after about 5 uses where most of the bristle have split ends, its as soft as badger brush. At least with this brush you don't have to worry about the bristle falling off after every use.
customer_reviews.author: Akai

customer_reviews.title: Brush that doesn't lather well
customer_reviews.text: I thought I just wasn't using it right because it was really hard to get the right consistency to the lather; it was either too wet or too chalky. But then when I tried the smallerI bought for travelling it worked perfectly every time. I ended up buying a second Escali brush and use that all the time now, no problems. The bristles are stiff and straw-like, it's a larger brush than most holders I've tried and it wouldn't lather.
customer_reviews.author: Bron and Marty

customer_reviews.title: Great brush, good backbone and no odd smell.
customer_reviews.text: I did follow others advice and shampoo'd the brush when I received it. There was no objectionable smell when I received it, and none developed. I like boar for the exfoliation factor, it provides a nice massage. Overall there is a reason this brush is hugely popular worldwide, and the value is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Biggy

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I definitely recommend it for beginners or if you like to leather up With a bar of soap and exfoliate your face at the same time It will get better with time.
customer_reviews.author: luis

customer_reviews.title: Great Brush
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure if I would like a synthetic brush, but it's awesome. Low price, great value. Bristles are sturdy without being stiff, they also don't splay or fray. Lather paints on the face perfectly with the bristles. Good handle too. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: hsephilly

customer_reviews.title: I peeled the sticker off as I like the solid black look (looks more classy to me) ...
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had any issues with this brush, I peeled the sticker off as I like the solid black look (looks more classy to me) however I did notice when I got it a few deep scuffs on the handle, however, for the price I paid I didn't really a expect a product with quality control that would catch something as small as this. Product works, lathers up nicely and feels great on my face. It's also a great size, covers more of my face which definitely isnt a bad thing.
customer_reviews.author: Nansense

customer_reviews.title: Large Well-Made Professional's Boat Brush
customer_reviews.text: If you're used to shaving with a tiny badger brush this is going to feel like Bigfoot's shaving brush the first few times you use it. This is the professional model designed for barbers. It's large size and long bristles allow the face to be lathered very quickly. Bristles are boars hair and need to be soaked in water for a few minutes before you use it or you will have trouble lathering the soap. Own several brushes but this is my daily use one.
customer_reviews.author: ➖Adam➖

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality brush at great price
customer_reviews.text: This brush is just too good. i have used mostly badger brushes for many years and this was my first purchase of boar. i bought this one and Semogue 1305 Boar brush together, i must say, this one simply outperforms the Semogue. The loft is high but that does not mean this ain't good for face lathering at all. i always face lather i can say with complete confidence the backbone is nice on this brush and produces more or less some same lather a badger would have produced. Once you break in, this brush will bring more joy to your shaving and will surely last for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: vishal

customer_reviews.title: It's Synthetic not Boar
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a Boar shaving brush. The description states "get your very own Omega Professional Hog shaving brush". Further down it says "natural bristle brush". The box says "100% Fibra Sintetica which translates "100% synthetic fiber". How can anyone market a synthetic fiber brush as a natural Hog bristle? Really disappointed. Amazon should find a new seller who will describe the product accurately.
customer_reviews.author: Robert W.

customer_reviews.title: Holds Lather well
customer_reviews.text: Have only used this a few times so it is still in the breaking in stage but it does the job well. I expect it to be even better as time goes on.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Young

customer_reviews.title: Good Starter Brush.
customer_reviews.text: Its a great brush if your first getting into wet shaving. Whiskers are longer than other brands but it lathers up very nicely. Shedding has started to happen to mine and I have had it a little longer than 8 months but that is common with natural badger hair plus I'm a little more aggressive with when I whip up my shaving cream!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A perfect brush
customer_reviews.text: I searched a long time for a good brush and recently returned a badger hair brush before I found this one. I love the fact that the bristles are stiff enough to hold their shape while I'm working up a good lather in the mug and then on my face. The badger hair brush flattened out like a pancake and was worthless. This one makes a great lather but is still plenty soft enough for me. I've been brush shaving for 40 years and this is the nicest brush I've found so far.
customer_reviews.author: M. Hewitt

customer_reviews.title: Wow that stink!! (With soulution)
customer_reviews.text: The new boar brush smell almost put me on my butt. Forget diluted vinegar, I had to soak this brush in a mug full of straight distilled vinegar overnight and then rinsed it off in the morning. Since then the smell has subsided and the brush works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: This was my first boar brush and I was frankly expecting it to be very stiff and uncomfortable at first until it broke in. I have to admit that it was quite comfortable from day one. Is it getting better with use, yes. But I thought it was very soft out of the box after soaking it for an appropriate amount of time pre-shave. The stink subsided after a good overnight soaking in water and Dawn. Now the stink is virtually gone after 2 weeks. I have a nice synthetic brush for traveling, but this is now my go-to brush for home. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Eyre T.

customer_reviews.title: Good brush!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, stiff brush. I did not notice any initial odor coming from the bristles. The stiffness helps stand up the facial hairs when the brush is pushed into the skin, hopefully resulting in a closer shave. The bristles are fairly long, which I liked. Decent purchase.
customer_reviews.author: USA1

customer_reviews.title: this brush is excellent. Much improved over the synthetic one I had ...
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this brush is excellent. Much improved over the synthetic one I had (more like a makeup brush). This one is stiff. It's a bit large - I would consider trimming the bristles if I thought I could do it right. It lathers well and works as intended. Made in italy.
customer_reviews.author: Todd A. Klick

customer_reviews.title: Great brush!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great brush! It's larger than most, but that's just what I wanted.I am going to use this brush with moisturizing body wash to scrub/exfoliate my face before shaving. I tried it out tonight and it felt good and prepped my face very well. I didn't notice any smell either. All in all, I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Good Brush so far
customer_reviews.text: Good Brush so far, I only use it a couple of times, It a big brush.It didnt smell bad as a lot of people said.I only saw a few hair that came out.I soak it over night, and then put shaving soap in it,and let it sit over night.I use it the next Day,after the third shave, it was more softer.It latter up well with the proraso soap.They say after about ten shave it get softer .It wasnt hard on my face.I will update more Detail later. thank amazon.
customer_reviews.author: taz140

customer_reviews.title: Hardly any hairs lost
customer_reviews.text: So yeah, after a few months I realize it is kinda big. But watch out for those tiny ones. Hardly any shedding, still lose a few every now and then. Didn't take long at all to 'soften up' which I hardly found to be a problem. Didn't notice really. Definitely more emollients in the puck than many cans so I get a much closer shave. And I'm only using the cheap brand that W/M sells.
customer_reviews.author: Mac29

customer_reviews.title: This big brush does the job
customer_reviews.text: The 10049 is a big boar bristle brush. Don't let that scare you, even if you have had stiff prickly boar brushes in the past ( I have ). This brush is pretty soft right out of the box and will get softer with use and man o man does it whip up lather! I use Proraso green and this brush is the perfect match to get a rich lather.
customer_reviews.author: Frank K

customer_reviews.title: This is a very nice brush
customer_reviews.text: I have several different brushes. I like this one, especially if I need to load up one hard soap. Get it when after another model from same company. Both are excellent. Smell not a pronlenafter shampoo. I am developing a present forboars hair brushes as opposed to badger hair".
customer_reviews.author: JAMES D LARSON

customer_reviews.title: Floppy but amazing
customer_reviews.text: Just a bit floppy but it's all I can ask for and more otherwise lol shed 3 hairs at the beginning
customer_reviews.author: 🖕🏽

customer_reviews.title: SMOOSH FACE!!
customer_reviews.text: SOOOOOO much better than the cheap "Badger" brush I bought. This thing is just perfect for _me_! The stiffness and lather building are perfect for either soaping up a shaving cup, or straight on your face. Buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Texas BellyDancer

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: As a newbie to the shaving brush game, this brush exceeds my expectations. It broke in fairly quick through regular use and I get way less ingrowns than I used to without it. I like the exfoliating feel of the stiffer bristles. May never need to use badger hair.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good, I guess
customer_reviews.text: Works fine. Not exactly the experience I was hoping for, seems like it should be fuller, like maybe 50% more bristles would do it.The Omega sticker slid into a crooked position after being wet for a while.
customer_reviews.author: KZ

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for the price. Didn't have any problems after breaking it in with a day of soaking. Like the handle size and bristle length. Feels stable in my hand too.
customer_reviews.author: mburzins

customer_reviews.title: the brush is a great option for someone interested in learning to shave in ...
customer_reviews.text: First shave brush I have ever ordered--for my husband. It is larger than I expected so the stand I purchased doesn't fit it. However, the brush is a great option for someone interested in learning to shave in a more "traditional" way.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Too large
customer_reviews.text: Nice bristle quality and no weird smell. My main negative is the size, the handle is two big to fit into most brush stands I have seen and the brush hair is quite long. If you are looking for decent, cheap, X-Large brush this would be a great choice.
customer_reviews.author: Rexcrispy

customer_reviews.title: Great brush!
customer_reviews.text: Really like this brush so far...actually I like it quite a bit better than the badger brush I purchased initially (which was surprisingly picky). I had some hesitation about this brush as many reviews talk about boar brushes being "smelly"...well, all I can say is that this one wasn't at all.
customer_reviews.author: TSTS

customer_reviews.title: Great quality brush for a steal.
customer_reviews.text: Best bang for your buck, great brush straight out of the box. Smells a little at first but it goes away, this brush just gets softer and better over time. The handle is nice and big fits well in my hand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best boar bristle brush you can get.
customer_reviews.text: Perhaps the best boar bristle shaving brush and at around ten dollars, is probably the best bang for your buck shaving cream brush you'll find. If you're looking for a high quality shaving brush but don't want to spend alot on higher end brushes, this is one of the brushes you should look for.
customer_reviews.author: Nuke87654

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Wish I would've bought it sooner. This took over for my daily shaving brush. Creates a great lather.
customer_reviews.author: Jcowans

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: The Omega Pro 49 brush works perfectly. It produces a nice lather and does not shed hairs. Mine had only a small amount of animal hair odor, which was completely gone after washing it with shampoo and bar soap. After a couple weeks of use, the bristles tips have softened and it feels great on my face.
customer_reviews.author: SoCalTim

customer_reviews.title: Very Good
customer_reviews.text: This brush lives up to its high ratings. I wouldn't mind a slightly smaller handle, I think.(I was looking for a 20102 but I couldn't find it on Amazon) The brush barely had an odor: if you stuck your nose in it when wet, it had a scent, but it was not an issue at all. Great starter, if not permanent, brush.
customer_reviews.author: consumer joe

customer_reviews.title: My favorite shaving brush
customer_reviews.text: This is not my first brush, but it is my first boar brush. Takes a couple dozen uses to be fully broken in. I prefer this brush over my badgers for face lathering. It is a very large brush...if you have smaller hands, get a smaller boar brush. Can't beat the performance for the price.
customer_reviews.author: ArtM

customer_reviews.title: Get it, it's worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Best shave brush I've bought in the last couple of years. Would definitely buy another.
customer_reviews.author: VandT

customer_reviews.title: Too long
customer_reviews.text: Bristles are slightly too long and stiff, but hopefully it will break in a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Drake

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: You really can't do much better for the price. The brush is durable, and effective. It was a little stiff at first, and a little smelly too... but that's to be expected with any boar hair brush. Once you break it in, the bristles get a lot softer, and it starts to smell more like shaving soap and less like boar. Ultimately, it's a great brush. Lathers well and works like a champ.
customer_reviews.author: A. D. Bart

customer_reviews.title: Great brush. The only downside is that the handle ...
customer_reviews.text: Great brush. The only downside is that the handle is way too thick for most stands, but the brush works as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: gnk

customer_reviews.title: it is still my favorite brush! It is slightly firm which I personally ...
customer_reviews.text: Ok, so it's not a hundred dollar badger but I don't care, it is still my favorite brush! It is slightly firm which I personally like but still feels soft enough on the face. It builds a nice creamy lather in no time at all and you can't beat the price!
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: This is my new favorite shaving brush now
customer_reviews.text: This is my new favorite shaving brush now. I do not think I will ever go back to expensive Badger brushes. Omega makes a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Dave MacRae

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This boat brush , is a great value for the price , lathers well, seems a bit stiffer than the badger brushes . Personally I’ve used both types and this one is by far my favorite .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Old fashion and great quality. I love it and makes shaving much ...
customer_reviews.text: Old fashion and great quality. I love it and makes shaving much nicer experience. It has some smell but it's not bad seems it normal.
customer_reviews.author: Leb961

customer_reviews.title: It's not perfect but value supersedes flaws.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this brush for over a month and the brush is of really good quality and lathers up the shave soap with ease. It does lose some hairs from time to time but that is to be expected. My primary issue with it is when applying the soap to my face for a face lather. The brush is a little too big for me as is spreads out and covers most of my cheek. However, I made a simple adjustment and my face lather was good. Overall, despite the brush being a little too big it is still a great value especially if you are new to wet shaving.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but seems to be good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: The brush breaks in very well over a month or so of use, becoming very soft. It looses a few bristles every few days, but seems to be good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph F.

customer_reviews.title: wrong item
customer_reviews.text: received wrong item. received kitchen aid 5 measuring plastic spoons. your answer to this , is item is not eiligbie for return. not happy !
customer_reviews.author: patrick f mcnally

customer_reviews.title: Nice brush for guys with coarse hair, but wastes too much soap.
customer_reviews.text: A nice brush for guys with coarse hair, but it’s large size generates/wastes too much soap. Recommend getting a brush with a smaller tip.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Was exactly what he wanted. He's been shaking for 60 years so he is particular about his products and this was a hit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable handle with capable bristles.
customer_reviews.text: Good value and holds a bunch of lather, but it does lose a few hairs regularly.
customer_reviews.author: BadBob

customer_reviews.title: Works well, has to go through the standard seasoning process to break in
customer_reviews.text: Works well, has to go through the standard seasoning process to break in. So far no shedding after the first week. Will post updates later on. Will not expect a boar bristle to be as soft as a badger brush, so may take some time to break in
customer_reviews.author: Carib Leather

customer_reviews.title: Very good for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good! Had this for a year and now it's kind of worn out, But I was hard on mine
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Brush
customer_reviews.text: Love this brush. I tried the Badger [which is supposed to be better] and like this one better. Makes great lather and feels good on my face. I get a great shave.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Allocca

customer_reviews.title: Solid Build
customer_reviews.text: I am impressed with this brush. It has a very sturdy and stout handle, which makes it very ergonomic. A shaving snob might not like something this cheap, but this brush is perfect for an economical (poor) person like me. It definitely gets the job done and looks as good as it feels.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: The nice item! For professional barbers and for everyone.
customer_reviews.text: Still not in use but in later I had the same and was very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Boar bristles are not the same as other Omega shaving brush
customer_reviews.text: Bristles are coming of the brush handle with couple of shaves. Quality is not great as expected with Omega products. Wonder if this original IL FAMOSO Omega product Made in Italy
customer_reviews.author: Shailesh Govani

customer_reviews.title: A very good brush...
customer_reviews.text: A very nice brush which will do a good job for you and should last for years. A bit disappointed it isn't offered in the two other colors by this seller, however.
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: Omega! Another wonderful boar brush
customer_reviews.text: As always these are still my favorite shaving brushes. I will own all of the omega brushes one day these are by far the best brushes made and very cost effective.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Nice big in size good for face leathering good product ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice big in size good for face leathering good product at reasonable price bristle king a little harder cause it's boar but overall good brush
customer_reviews.author: Nitish

customer_reviews.title: I love mine so much
customer_reviews.text: I love mine so much, I bought one for my Dad. After a couple of uses, the boar blossoms into what you really want from a brush. Sure, I lost a couple of loose hairs, but the rest are tight and really create a 3-time lather from my Art of Shaving cream (not a soaper).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great brush. It's my first brush
customer_reviews.text: Great brush. It's my first brush, but it loads really well. Like others say, there's a bit of initial odor, but it dissipates quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan P.

customer_reviews.title: The gold standard
customer_reviews.text: The Omega Professional is the gold standard in Boar brushes. You won't ever spend money on a badger after you use this. Soak it while you shower in some warm water and you'll be good to go.
customer_reviews.author: John Z

customer_reviews.title: Great Brush!
customer_reviews.text: I got this brush as a travel brush, but I like it a lot... In fact, I like it more than brushes that are several times more expensive! This has wonderful backbone, and once broken in, very soft tips! I would recommend this to any customer wanting a cheap, but high quality brush!
customer_reviews.author: Hayden-James

customer_reviews.title: Amazed
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this brush! It whips up a great lather and will outperform most other brushes, badger included! Honestly, for the price, this brush is a steal! I love the massage that my face gets from it (I face lather), and my skin is always exfoliated because of this brush!
customer_reviews.author: Hayden-James

customer_reviews.title: I'm sure that there are better brushes out there
customer_reviews.text: Solid brush, lathers well. It does have a scent that hasn't came out yet but all animal hair brushes do, just takes some time. I'm sure that there are better brushes out there, but for the money, it would be hard to beat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great brush
customer_reviews.text: I love this brush. nice shiny black handle. boar bristles easily apply shaving soap. good quality. love it
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: First time user of this product. Great value for money.
customer_reviews.author: ERW

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Been Using For A while - works very well soaps up nice
customer_reviews.author: BoostCeuticals

customer_reviews.title: Good Brush-Recieved wrong color
customer_reviews.text: Replacement brush due to moving. Love this brush. Only one complaint- Ordered black, received white.
customer_reviews.author: DL

customer_reviews.title: Great brush!
customer_reviews.text: Great brush for the money. I prefer badger but this one makes it into my rotation at least once a week.
customer_reviews.author: Kirk Vilhauer

customer_reviews.title: Great brush for the money
customer_reviews.text: There's no getting around it, this brush is HUGE! It's a little too big, but for the quality at the price point, it's such a great deal. Despite its size, this brush never disappoints. It breaks in quickly, retains it's moisture and is always easy to load.
customer_reviews.author: kerplunk

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I liked the fact that no badgers were harmed to make it.
customer_reviews.author: wheels

customer_reviews.title: I like the size as well of the brush
customer_reviews.text: This is the first brush I have had. It lathered my soap very well compared to the by hand process I was using. There is a slight smell to the brush at first but is not offensive. I like the size as well of the brush.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My first shaving brush and been in use for a couple months..
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Great brush. I switch on and off with another ...
customer_reviews.text: Great brush.I switch on and off with another Omega boar bristle.No foul oder or lost hair.
customer_reviews.author: paul mclaughlin

customer_reviews.title: Happy Grandpa
customer_reviews.text: Great! Grandpa wanted one like he used to have, he absolutely loves this quality economical boar shaving brush! Happy Grandpa!
customer_reviews.author: kimberly Jatkowski

customer_reviews.title: Great first brush!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first brush, and I must say, it's quite a pleasure to use it. My only complaint is that the knot is overly large, and as a result, it won't fit many brush stands.
customer_reviews.author: Zane

customer_reviews.title: Love it..
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous brush no matter what the cost. What a great find.
customer_reviews.author: KDWin

customer_reviews.title: This brush is nice and big and lathers nicely
customer_reviews.text: This brush is nice and big and lathers nicely, its my favorite brush I have a Badger brush but I like to use this boar brush more cause its big, lathers very fast and its just pleasant to use.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Charmed by others, but always come back to this Omega
customer_reviews.text: This was the first brush I purchased [ 9 months ago] for face lathering. I've collected a half dozen brushes since this one and have had some time to compare. I like this brush very much. Lathered well right out of the box and I like the big knot and the stiffer feel of boar. I've been charmed by others, but always come back to this Omega with a smile. At 12 bucks, I don't think you can go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Davio

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have a more expensive brush for home, I bought this for my travel case. Works fine
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great brush, can't beat the price
customer_reviews.text: Classic! Great brush, can't beat the price. Once it's broken in it feels great and can make a ton of lather.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good size brush, Lathers well and is the right price.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice dense bristles. Works up a nice lather. Good product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Narey

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Great great brush. This is THE budget brush to get.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby J. Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Great Brush
customer_reviews.text: Once it gets broken in, it gets softer. This is perfect for soaps, but works equally well with creams.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: This brush is HUGE....
customer_reviews.text: This brush is a big brush...Really BIG. That being said, it is a great bowl lathering brush... very soft but kinda floppy. Made with quality components, nice soft tips. It is in my brush rotation, so I use it regularly and it was really cheap. Great product, great price. VERY BIG!
customer_reviews.author: Ellen M

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: sheds a bit but works good enough for my shaving applications
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Hamblin

customer_reviews.title: Great brush for under $20.00
customer_reviews.text: This brush isn't ready to go right out of the box. It is more of a project that takes a few weeks to fully break in. When you get it, it will be a little stiff and scratchy, but after continuous use the hairs begin to split creating a soft brush with great backbone. Just give it time and once it breaks in it will be significantly better than any badger brush at the same price point.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this brush last week, and what I received instead of the Omega Professional Boar Hair brush that was advertised was an Omega SB-550, a brush of relatively inferior quality that regularly retails on eBay for about $12. Don't get taken by the false advertising. Only deal with reputable shaving supply houses, and make sure you are getting exactly what you order at a fair price. Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Hutchinson

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: I own two badger brushes and this boar brush. Since it's the only boar brush I own, I can't compare it to other boar brushes. That being said, there is a significant difference between this boar brush and my badger brushes. The badger brushes absorb significantly more water thereby generating a richer lather. As you might imagine, this brush is significantly stiffer than a badger brush. I'll keep it and use it, but I won't buy another boar brush.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great brush. Very soft with good backbone once broken in. Can't go wrong for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Riley Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Over four years and going strong
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the same Omega Boar brush for over four years. I had used two badger brushes before and found them lacking (not stiff enough for a shave soap and they weren't attached to the handle very well). This brush will start out with a bit of a boar smell but that does not last more than a month. The bristles start a bit stiff but split and soften up in about the same amount of time. I loose a single bristle every few shaves but the whole assembly is very good and is holding up well. Cannot recommend enough.
customer_reviews.author: Schrenk Family

customer_reviews.title: Better than Expected
customer_reviews.text: The omega logo sticker comes off very easily and I’m glad I purchased this shave soap brush, this item was on my wish list for a long time because I wanted a solid black handle, after reading reviews I saw nothing that mentioned the sticker can easily be removed if I had I would have purchased this brush months ago, some people like badger hair but I like boar hair which is this brush it’s much stiffer and lathers soap more efficiently
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: I would buy again !
customer_reviews.text: A good quality product for the price. I use every day and after a few weeks it was broken in perfect. It takes a little bit of time. It will drop a hair every now and then.
customer_reviews.author: Chance B

customer_reviews.title: A Great Shaving Brush!
customer_reviews.text: An excellent shave brush for home use. Holds right amount of water and bristles ply easily over your face, rather than stab it. Very comfortable and easy to maintain.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Brown

product_meta.title: Omega Pure Bristle 10049 Shaving Brush, Black
product_meta.description: Color:BlackTheir natural bristle brush provides the shaver with plenty of lather for a good old fashioned shave. Get your very own Omega Professional Hog shaving brush in a brilliantly finished Black handle.
feature_bullets: Get your very own Omega Professional Hog shaving brush in a brilliantly finished Black handle.
Work up a quick lather with this brush and enjoy the quality and craftsmanship for many years to come.
